import React from "react"; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; export default function Checkout({cart, isScrolled}) { function handleClick() { fetch('https://haus-db.onrender.com/orders', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, body: JSON.stringify({ "total_price": total, "user_id": currentUser.id, "items": JSON.stringify(cartItems) }) }).then(r => r.json()) .then(data => { setCurrentUser(data.user) console.log(currentUser) return fetch(`https://haus-db.onrender.com/users/clear_bag/${currentUser.id}`, { method: 'DELETE', headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } }) }).then(r => r.json()) .then(data => { setCartItems(data.user.cart_items) }) } return (
{cart.length !== 0 &&

Order Information

{cart.map(item => { return (

{item.furniture.name}

USD {item.furniture.price.toLocaleString()}

x{item.quantities}

) })}

Subtotal

USD 30,000

Shipping

USD 50

Taxes

USD 300

USD 22,000

}
) }
